tasks.title: Optimize plan for embeddable live charts
tasks.description: Outline approach for advanced charts embeddable via script with live updates using existing API polling.

subtasks.title: Audit existing chart implementation
subtasks.description: Review components/charts/*, lib/charts, and related types to inventory reusable chart primitives and identify embeddability gaps.

subtasks.title: Document embed contract
subtasks.description: Draft _docs/features/charts/embed-contract.md specifying script API, config schema, authentication, theming options, and polling cadence.

subtasks.title: Author embed loader tests
subtasks.description: Create tests/external/embed-chart.spec.tsx covering configuration bootstrapping, polling interval dispatch, and reactive chart updates using mocked fetch responses.

subtasks.title: Add mock live data API route
subtasks.description: Implement app/api/charts/live/[chartId]/route.ts returning deterministic metrics with ETag headers and validation using shared API utilities.

subtasks.title: Build polling hook
subtasks.description: Add lib/hooks/useLiveChartData.ts providing configurable polling with zod-validated responses, SWR-style caching, and cleanup logic.

subtasks.title: Create embeddable frame components
subtasks.description: Implement components/external/embed-chart-frame.tsx and embed-chart.tsx composing loader states, theming, and chart primitives while staying under 250 lines each.

subtasks.title: Expose public embed bootstrap
subtasks.description: Create external/embed/index.ts exporting mountDealScaleChart, wiring dynamic import of components and ensuring compatibility with Next standalone bundling.

subtasks.title: Isolate embed styling
subtasks.description: Add public/embed/deal-scale-charts.css with scoped variables and document how host sites override colors without global leakage.

subtasks.title: Write operational guide
subtasks.description: Document integration, polling limits, and QA flow in _docs/features/charts/embed-live-updates.md referencing mock endpoints and configuration schema.

subtasks.title: Capture QA checklist
subtasks.description: Add follow-up checklist (cross-origin embed, theme overrides, throttle behavior, websocket enhancement backlog) to docs or task comments for future tracking.
